# avatar-component

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property      | Attribute      | Description                          | Type                                  | Default     |
| ------------- | -------------- | ------------------------------------ | ------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `alt`         | `alt`          | Alternate text when src image breaks | `string`                              | `undefined` |
| `customClass` | `custom-class` | Custom class for the image           | `string`                              | `undefined` |
| `size`        | `size`         | Avatar image size                    | `"large" \| "medium" \| "small"`      | `'medium'`  |
| `src`         | `src`          | Image source url                     | `string`                              | `undefined` |
| `tooltipTxt`  | `tooltip-txt`  | Show title of the image on hover     | `string`                              | `undefined` |
| `variant`     | `variant`      | Avatar image shape variants          | `"circular" \| "rounded" \| "square"` | `'rounded'` |
